title: Twitter Keeps Missing Its Advertising Targets as Woes Mount
description: Under Elon Musk, the company has cut its financial expectations as some advertisers request discounts and are offered incentives.

title: Hate Speech’s Rise on Twitter Under Elon Musk Is Unprecedented, Researchers Find
description: Problematic content and formerly barred accounts have increased sharply in the short time since Elon Musk took over, researchers said.

title: Elon’s Two-Day War with Apple + How to Beat an A.I. Censor + S.B.F.’s ‘Bad Month’
description: Musk takes on tech’s fight against the Apple “tax.”

title: The Crypto Crowd Holds a Glittery Awards Night, Despite Fiascoes
description: The Crypties was intended as a gala evening in Miami to celebrate the currencies of the future. It turned out to be more of a roast.
